item.title: Introduction
item.description:
PositionPal is a micro-services-based application for creating groups of trusted users with whom to share location, routes, and notify of dangerous or emergency situation to create an effective and timely service and support network.

The idea comes from some news read recently about young people who, on their way home at night in unsafe areas of the city, share their location in a WhatsApp group of users to support and watch each other.

item.title: Self Assessment and Validation
item.description:
Different types of automated tests are in place to ensure the correctness of the system, as well as the quality of the software product as a whole.

Architectural Testing link

ArchUnit have been used to enforce architectural constraints, making sure to adhere to the Hexagonal architecture (otherwise said Onion or Ports and Adapters) and preventing unwanted dependencies, maintaining separation of concerns and ensuring architectural decisions are consistently followed over time.
